    • createWSWRLRuleEngine

      public WSWRLRuleEngine createWSWRLRuleEngine(WSWRLOntology ontology) throws WSWRLRuleEngineException
      Description copied from interface: WSWRLRuleEngineFactory
      Creates new WSWRL rule engine. Relies on WSWRLRuleEngineFactory.createWSWRLRuleEngine(String, String, WSWRLOntology). This methos find automatically available SWRL and WSWRL target rule engines.
      Specified by:
